sections.text: Individual policies of life insurance issued to debtors on the term plan;
Individual policies of accident and health insurance issued to debtors on a term plan or disability provisions in individual life policies to provide such coverage;
Group policies of life insurance issued to creditors providing insurance upon the lives of debtors on the term plan; and
Group policies of accident and health insurance issued to creditors on a term plan insuring debtors or disability provisions in group life policies to provide such coverage.

subtitle.text: Provisions Applicable to More Than One Kind of Insurance.

chapter.text: Credit Life, Accident, and Health Insurance.
